params.investmentId: ID of the investment to cancel
ID of the investment to confirm

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

params.amount: Investment amount in offering's base currency
params.referenceId: External reference ID (e.g., wire confirmation number)
params.tokenQuantity: Quantity of tokens to be issued
